title: A Newbery Halloween: A Dozen Scary Stories by Newbery Award-Winning Authors
description: A collection of thirteen scary stories by Newbery Medalists Beverly Cleary, Madeleine L'Engle, Paul Fleishman, Eleanor Estes, and E. L. Konigsbury, among others, provides thrills and chills, ghosts and witches, to make any Halloween perfectly spooky.
author: Martin H. Greenberg
